title: 装个forge累死我了
author: 新手求教
txt_content:
今天我的mc全部消失了，还的我得重装mod，我一开始只装forge，可是怎么也进不去游戏了（那个邪恶的绝对删除了），进游戏时给我提示这个：

求解决





QQ截图20121014135422.jpg
(11.51 KB, 下载次数: 0)




下载附件


2012-10-14 13:54 上传

replies.author: aa210063654
replies.txt_content:
新手求教 发表于 2012-10-14 16:31 
2012-10-14 13:54:17  [ForgeModLoader] Forge Mod Loader version 3.0.196.366 for Minecraft client:1. ...
把.minecraft\lib目录下全部删掉= =
然后下载这三个文件到.minecraft\lib
http://files.minecraftforge.net/fmllibs/argo-2.25.jar
http://files.minecraftforge.net/fmllibs/guava-12.0.1.jar
http://files.minecraftforge.net/fmllibs/asm-all-4.0.jar

replies.author: lirenjue
replies.txt_content: 你囧么能先装MOD 然后再装Forge呢....

replies.author: aa210063654
replies.txt_content: 把那个.log文件弄上来看看0-0?

replies.author: 新手求教
replies.txt_content:
